reviewText: I kept waiting for something to happen...took about 1:15 minutes before the action kicked in. By that time, I was stupified by the cheesy 80's music and costumes, and slow moving nonsense. The producers said "Hey, we spent a lot of money on these sets, so let's make sure we roll lots of footage of people wandering around." Donald Pleasance may be gone, but this wretched "i need the money' performance remains. They don't even give you a good shot of the monster at the climax.
